Mercury | Founding team designer | SF| Full-time, ONSITE

Mercury is a stealth fin-tech startup. We are currently 3 people (2 engineers, 1 BD/Ops) but have raised $6m from a tier A VC. We are looking to grow our team and add a designer.

This is my 4th company. My previous company, Heyzap, was YC09, was funded by USV+Qualcomm and was acquired for $45m last year.

Sorry for the stealthiness happy to go in to way more details on a call.

We are looking for someone who is good at taking large amounts of information and showing it in a concise/friendly way. Mostly Photoshop/Sketch work but if they can do HTML/CSS thats good too

My email in profile or email jobs AT mercury DOT co.
